1.0.name: wordpress/delicious-bookmark-button
1.0.description: A cool and easy to implement delicious bookmarker badge with total bookmark count. It adds a delicious badge / button to your post / page which allows you to bookmark the post / page. It also reflect a real-time count of how many times your page has been bookmarked in delicious, just like tweetmeme button does for twitter. Both standard and compact badge options to choose from.
